name: MicroChess
description:
A variation on the rules of chess.

No sound because I didn't had means to do anything worth it.

Play with arrows on your keyboard or click on orange arrows to make the screen scroll.
You can use R key to reset a stage if you want to reset faster.

Don't spam too much, I'm pretty sure it will crash :-)

Please take time to rate the game for Ludum Dare:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-31/?action=preview&uid=15006
